item.title: About
item.description: About Scawwy Howwow Inspired by the theatre manifesto of Antonin Artaud, Scawwy Howwow Theatre aims to push the limits of theatre, media, and horror. From new formats to new mediums to new voices, we aim to bring a whole new experience to the world. For inquiries, reach us at scawwyhowwowtheatre@gmail.com. The Team Nicholas Tran Executive Director Daniel Moore Creative Director Subin Ahn

item.description: Projects Tales from the Visa Line An online charity theatre festival benefiting the International Refugee Assistance Project untitled [redacted] A surreal horror audio drama/podcast
